altername_name: トラブル☆ウィッチーズ ふぁいなる！ ~Episode01 アマルガムの娘たち~
name: Trouble Witches Final! Episode 1: Daughters of Amalgam
overview: Trouble Witches is a comical witch side-scrolling shooter game. This story doesn’t take place in the present, but in a dream-like world where life thrives in abundance without fear-Karunbunkurs. Here, time passes slowly like a huge wave; people and nature exist together in eternal harmony and prosperity. Beings living here discovered a miraculous power, which was, at first, small, and then grew large enough to move the world. The power transformed into “mana,” a force that could only be handled by a chosen few, to whom it was entrusted. It has been used properly and passed down from generation to generation; now, after several millennia, the power has become common and natural, a convenient form of witchcraft.
